program codeforces_92_A

implicit none

integer :: n, k, i, req

! Read inputs:

read(*,*) n, k

i=1

req=1

do 

    if (k - req <0 ) then 

        exit ; ! similar to break?

    else 

        k = k - req 

    end if 

    i = i + 1 if (mod(i, n) /=0) then 

        req = mod(i, n) 

    else 

        req = n 

    end if 

end do 

write(*,*) k 

end program
